sentences.en: a lovely rose bush with delicate pink flowers
sentences.cn: 一簇开着娇嫩的粉红色花朵的美丽蔷薇

sentences.en: As one plant fades, another comes into flower.
sentences.cn: 一株植物凋谢了，另一株又会盛开。

sentences.en: Bulbs that you plant in the autumn should flower the following spring.
sentences.cn: 秋天种下的鳞茎植物来年春天就会开花。

sentences.en: Butterflies flitted from flower to flower.
sentences.cn: 蝴蝶在花丛中飞来飞去。

sentences.en: Each individual flower is tiny.
sentences.cn: 每一朵花都很小。

sentences.en: fields full of beautiful wild flowers
sentences.cn: 开满美丽野花的田野

sentences.en: he wasted the flower of French youth on his dreams of empire.
sentences.cn: 为实现帝国之梦，他荒废了法国的青年精英。

sentences.en: It was May, and the apple trees were all in flower.
sentences.cn: 那是个5月，苹果树开满了花。

sentences.en: Pickers are bent double, plucking each flower with lightning speed.
sentences.cn: 采花人弓着身子飞快地摘着花。

sentences.en: Several of these rhododendrons will flower this year for the first time.
sentences.cn: 这些杜鹃花有些将在今年首度开花。

sentences.en: She now makes wonderful dried flower arrangements to order.
sentences.cn: 现在她为顾客定做漂亮的干花插花。

sentences.en: Some of the daffodils are still in flower.
sentences.cn: 有些水仙花仍在开放。

sentences.en: The flower beds were overrun with grasses.
sentences.cn: 花坛里杂草横生。

sentences.en: The flower opens to reveal a Queen Bee.
sentences.cn: 花瓣展开，一只蜂王露了出来。

sentences.en: The house was always decorated with imaginative flower arrangements.
sentences.cn: 这所房子总是摆放着富有创意的插花。

sentences.en: The old flower and fruit market has been put up for sale.
sentences.cn: 旧的花草水果市场已开始求售了。

sentences.en: The plant has a beautiful bright red flower.
sentences.cn: 这株植物开了一朵美丽鲜红的花。

sentences.en: This helps to ripen new growth and makes it flower profusely.
sentences.cn: 这有助于新生发植株的成熟，令其开出繁茂的花朵。

sentences.en: Those killed have been described as the flower of Polish manhood.
sentences.cn: 那些牺牲者被称为波兰男子中的精英。

sentences.en: to hoe the flower beds
sentences.cn: 用锄头给花坛除草松土

words.tran_cn: 花的；华丽的；绚丽的；多花的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 切花，鲜切花；插瓶花
卖花女；婚礼中持花少女
精英，优秀分子；精华，最好的部分

trans.tran_en: a coloured or white part that a plant or tree produces before fruit or seeds
a coloured or white part that a plant or tree produces before fruit or seeds

trans.tran_cn: 成熟，发育；开花；繁荣；旺盛
